channel.title: Chaotic-Scape 317 with 562 graphics and 614 items! The Unique Server
channel.description:
[center]Join chaotic-scape today! [img]http://leagueofchaos.net/images/LoC-Bannar-2.gif[/img]
Links: [url=http://www.leagueofchaos.net/]Main Page[/url] [url=http://www.leagueofchaos.net/play.php]Webclient[/url] [url=http://www.leagueofchaos.net/smf/index.php]Forums[/url]
Description: We are a 317 server with 562 graphics and with 614 items. We have customized items, Nex items, a soon to be custom minigame, great staff and more!
Info: Working money pouch! Nex items! Custom Minigame! Player-Owned Shops! Dragonbone mage and melee Loyalty titles 100% curses Loyalty Points Skilling points Custom Shops Dungeoneering Minigame! Slayer tasks + Slayer shops! Perfect switching for Pking! Funpk added! Achievements + Achievement Rewards! GWD added in! Revenants in wildy! Colored whips and infinity! Primals released! All defenders added including dragon and flameburst enchanted helms released! Slayer helm! Handcannon 100%! special attacks 100%! Donator ranks added! Black Partyhat! Donator Panel! Donator zone added!
Pics: [img]http://i.imgur.com/sgyvK.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CTjeO.png[/img]

item.title: Chaotic-Scape 317 with 562 graphics and 614 items! The Unique Server
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

No offense, but the customs are ugly. At-least the ones that weren’t already pre-made. Put some more detail into them it looks like a crayola art.
